summary: Reduces the weight of various items in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Before I continue, some items that are .25, .75, etc will show up as being rounded up to .3, .8, etc on the default inventory (not sure about custom UIs). I only modified the weight values however I have not been able to get this mod to coexist with any mods that alter the value of the same items. I've tried other weight-modifying mods to see if it's an isolated event and it is not, if I discover a way to make them compatible I will update accordingly.

There is two options to download. One contains 1 esp that combines all effects and another download which contains 8 esps with 8 different readme's. If I recall there is a mod limit so once a mash-up of these esps has been tested (I have bat files with all of the items in this mod) it will be posted. I am still debating if I wish to go further with my weight modifications.

If you want to keep the changes from a mod that modifies anything from an item from any of the esps I suggest loading it after the esp it would effect.

For a full list of the items altered click the Read Me section and hit ctrl+f to start the search.

This mod was made for myself because I was unhappy with the weight choices by Bethesda and other mods. Nothing is weightless in these mods and some items are reduced up to 80%. Any feedback is appreciated as this was my first mod and used as a learning experience to get comfortable with how they name certain things in the CK.

Completed:
Lighter Animal parts
Lighter Dragon Scales and Bones
Lighter Dwemer Items
Lighter Food
Lighter Ingredients
Lighter Ores and Ingots
Lighter Potions
Lighter Scrolls

Might Do:
Lighter Books
Lighter Misc Items
Lighter Quest Items (would NOT include equippable "quest" items like bows, armor, swords, etc that you retrieve for npcs.)
author: 6Domino6
